job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the construction and maintenance of the server-side of software applications.
This indicates involvement in the end-to-end process of creating and releasing software functionalities.
This specifically mentions the creation of interfaces for backend services, a core software development activity.
This refers to the processes and systems responsible for gathering and bringing data into a usable format.
This implies a significant role in designing the fundamental structure and design of the backend systems.
This indicates a need for guiding and supporting other engineers, requiring strong communication and interpersonal skills.
This highlights a need for a practical and effective approach to work and problem-solving.
This suggests a role in shaping the future technical path and taking initiative.
This points to a collaborative environment where open communication and input are valued.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional backend software development, API development, and data ingestion. There is no mention of generative AI, LLMs, or related specialized AI tasks. The skills and technologies implied are standard for a backend engineer role, not a GenAI Engineer.
